Module io.netty5.handler
Package io.netty5.handler.ipfilter

Class UniqueIpFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.netty5.handler.ipfilter.AbstractRemoteAddressFilter<InetSocketAddress>
      • io.netty5.handler.ipfilter.UniqueIpFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ChannelHandler
    @Sharable
public class UniqueIpFilter
extends AbstractRemoteAddressFilter<InetSocketAddress>
    This class allows one to ensure that at all times for every IP address there is at most one Channel connected to the server.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface io.netty5.channel.ChannelHandler

        Specified by:
        accept in class AbstractRemoteAddressFilter<InetSocketAddress>
        Returns:
        Return true if connections from this IP address and port should be accepted. False otherwise.
